20101221035924.000|20101221035924.000|CC1|I...UH...THOUGHT YOU MIGHT BE

20101221035928.000|20101221035928.000|CC1|                     NO.        
20101221035928.000|20101221035930.000|CC1|           I'M GIVING FOR SKUNK.
20101221035930.000|20101221035931.000|CC1|       UH, I CAN HEAR YOU.      
20101221035931.000|20101221035931.000|CC1|                NO. NOT YOU.
